document_data.name: Fire Trap
document_data.mainbody: '''Fire trap''''' was both an [[abjuration]] and [[evocation]] spell that could be used on any closeable item, installing a [[trap]] that caused a small fiery explosion upon unauthorized entry.
document_data.History: This spell was invented by the [[arcanist]] and Fire Warden of [[Netheril]] [[Noanar]] in {{Yearlink|-2319}}. It was the first of his many [[fire]]-based spells, and originally called '''''Noanar's trap'''''.
